resources.string: Getting distracted while trying to get things done? Here goes what you gotta do:
The natural music of the rain and thunders are going to relax you. The sustained sound will make you forget the environment surrounding you. Now it\'s only you and your duties. Good Luck!
The sounds are a modified version of a file provided by RHumphires & Reinsamba under Creative Commons License.
